review:
My mother has been facing pain in her teeth since a few years as one molar cracked while she was snacking on a local delicacy. She visited several dentists but none understood her problem precisely and could give her a solution.
A visit to MSDC with Dr. Angshuman and his multi-speciality team gave us several options to go about the treatment. After trying out a Root Canal, I was pleasantly surprised that the doctor actually texted me the same night to find out how my mother was dealing with the pain. Out of the scores of patients they treat every day the doctor actually followed up with a patient.
If that was not commendable enough, MSDC impressed me yet again. Ultimately, my mother had to go for an extraction of her tooth to be replaced with an implant 3 months later. On the day of the tooth extraction, a member of MSDC's panel, Dr. Nitubrata still did his duty even though Dr. Nitubrata's wife was facing severe pain in her chest and was admitted in the ICU ward. The extraction was done painlessly and the cracked tooth came out in pieces. After extraction my mother can continue delighting on her favourite ice creams and we look forward to the implant process, as well.
Kudos to the focused leadership of Dr. Angshuman and the service oriented team at Mission Smile Dental Centre (MSDC).
reply_text: When a patient is in pain it hurts us equally and we strive to find out a way to alleviate it the earliest. And we always believe that Your Smile Is Ours Too. Keep Smiling!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was explained in details why in my case normal braces were not an option and i should instead opt for the Invisalign braces. This was rather very helpful in taking a concrete decision for my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I visited this place for my son Hillol's dental problem. He has misaligned jaws.. they call it deep bite or  something like this. We have been  explained regarding the problem and possible remedies.  We were in the search such clinic where we would get comprehensive treatment under one roof. I think finally we have found one.  The doctor has a very good team of young doctors. In the first sitting my son got his teeth cleaned. A young lady doctor did it very carefully and patiently without hurting. Then another pair of young doctors patiently  took digital imagery of entire mouth cavity which is part of the procedure. I hope to receive similar care in the course of my son's treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I was in immense pain due to my wisdom tooth. One of my friend recommended Dr. Anshuman bhattacharya to me. Immediately I took the earliest appointment. The service was very prompt and fast. Sir explained to me my concerned condition. I had pretty less time in hand, he readily accepted to do my extraction in the same day. The staff are very hospitalable and helpful. The extraction went very smooth. Even now after the 1day extraction I have hardly have any pain. ******* ***** ** *** ******* hospitalable staff , very good environment.I would highly recommend to avail any dental service from them.

I went there for my braces treatment after looking at lots of reviews on the net. However, he just suggests the Invisalign slingers ***** ***** ****** *** ****** There are no other options like ceramic or metal braces which he can help you with. Takes very little time to explain the issue and spends a lot of time trying to push you to go ahead with the invisible alingers.  A doctor should give an unbiased opinion on the treatment options available.
The staff at this clinic are very helpful and cordial though!
reply_text: This Orthodontic centre provides all forms of braces. We will always recommend the best for our patients. Treatment options are selected considering his/her age, malocclusion type, oral hygiene status and patient's convenience and time frame the patient has for the treatment.

review: Dr. Angshuman & his team are awesome! The staff is inviting and polite and from the moment I entered there was professionalism and transparency. Dr. Angshuman is attentive to questions and extremely knowledgeable. The space is very clean and well maintained which accents the modern tools and equipment that the team uses. This is my 1st review here,& I want to potentially help others in their decision making process! Needless to mention,Dr. Angshuman is  friendly, professional and has great dental skills. Two thumbs up!!

Mission smile... A place which really makes me smile. Dr. Angshuman Bhattacharya is an amazing doctor, one of the best who I very ever had the pleasure to know.  His attitude and confidence makes you feel secure, giving you a feeling of coming to the right place.  His team of doctors at mission smile are excellent. 
My elder son, now 15, was treated for braces here. He did not have any problem whatsoever, no blisters,no pain and no swelling. Now with the grace of God and Dr. Angshuman and his awesome team, he's got an awesome smile. My younger son will also be starting treatment here.
The whole team of mission smile,  starting with Dr. Angshuman,  doctors and full staff are always courteous,  pleasant and a pleasure to talk to and be with.  Reminders are given for appointments, and changes are accommodated. 
I wish Dr. Angshuman another entire team at mission smile all the best always!  Keep smiling! :-)
The team of doctors are very friendly and the appointment flexibility is superb. It helps me attending my school and study without any problem.
Very high price. Not friendly at all. Not recommended. Visit showing in practo is rs. 900 but when I went there they charged r 1200. ***** ***************
reply_text: Dear Mr. Banik, Greetings from Mission Smile Dental Centre. We take your feedback positively. And we are here to help you and give you more options which will be more cost effective.  The treatment plan given to you is fpr full mouth dental implant and rehabilitaion in which more options can be provided. And regarding your fees  you booked for general dental consultation which starts from Rs. 900. But after checking you we did a detailed 40 minutes dental implant consultation with all explanations which is Rs.1200. Wishing you the very best with your dental health always. Regards.

review:
Reading the positive reviews on practo of dr angshuman, I thought its cooked up but still I went to him. But the visit to his clinic proved me wrong. Mission Smile Support Staff are very sincere, kind and emphatic towards others. I went for the dental treatment of my dad who couldn't walk properly due to paralysis. Appointment ended late evening and one of the support staff stayed late only to help my dad in sitting in the cab. This shows how good mission smile support staffs are.
And Dr Angshuman Ji is a doctor who offers best advice in the best interest of his patients. He is  emphatic towards his patients problems. He listened to our problem very patiently and was very understanding to our problem.
Dr Angshuman Ji one of the few, kind doctors whom I have met who is not monetarily driven but patients satisfaction driven. He is a professional with a humanly touch. 
I will recommend mission smile, especially Dr Angshuman Ji to all.
Date of Visit -18.05.2017
reply_text: Thanx for the feedback....u made my day!!!

review:
Dr. Angshuman Bhattacharya is a brilliant doctor who  is extremely good at his job. He has done a brilliant job for my daughter and the glittering smile he brought on her face is worth the time taken for the entire treatment. I wholeheartedly recommend that anybody with Orthodontic problem should visit Dr. Bhattacharya to get a brilliant smile on his/her face. The clinic keeps up to its very well chosen name "Mission Smile".
Thank you Dr. Bhattacharya for the wonderful job and wish you all the best in life.

Start your day with smile and see the difference and for that u need to maintain your smile. I was scared and nervous when I first came here. But as my treatment started my dentist Dr. Angshuman made the procedure very comfortable and relaxed. I had varied problems which was dealt by specialised doctors ( Dr. Nitubrata and Dr. Suman). It was a painless treatment and went very smoothly. The staff specially Arunda and Poornima were very cooperative and always there to attend. The music lightens the stress in your mind. Lastly u just need to visit here once and they also give reminders for your appointments and ensures good health for your teeth. They are very particular with the timings and work by appointments. That's the best part I liked. Apart from the treatment they emphasise on proper brushing and flossing for prevention. Mission Smile's main mission is to give u a healthy teeth and beautiful smile. So if you are looking for a dentist then this is the right place.

Simply excellent!I was visiting from US and was in the city for less than a week and Dr. Angshuman did a fantastic job to address so many of my concerns and problems within a short time and packed schedule. He got a team of doctors together- all of them are experts in their field- to address my concerns. He identified problems that dental doctors in US failed to identify. My crown for root canal was delivered within couple days and so was my customized mouth guard. And on the top, he took time to explain all the problems for me to understand and didn't overwhelm/insists me with procedures I didn't need. Very happy with the experience. Highly recommend-  and I'd definitely consult him again when I'm back in town.
reply_text: Thanx for the encouraging feedback Sampriti. Looking forward to seeing you here again but this time with a happy dental health. Keep flossing everyday. Cheers!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Mission smile needs no introduction. We have been going there since long. What has impressed me most was the safety precautions taken ever since Covid  has happened. In those days people were scared to go to  hospitals leave alone visitng a dentist. Mission smile has made everlasting impression since then.  My family's Absolute go to for any dental issues. I have left Kavishs braces treatment entirely in the hands of Dr.  Angshuman, for i trust him and his team.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had been recommended to consult Dr Angshuman. In other words, destiny got me there. I owe my Thank You to Dr Angshuman and Dr Nitubrata. I would recommend anyone with any kind of dental issue(s), should, atleast once, consult Dr Angshuman. Best, and Keep up the endeavor for better Dental treatment and Awareness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,

I  had a severe resistant skeletal deep bite and crowding of my teeth together with abnormally slow eruption pattern of my permanent teeth with delayed dental age. Doctor with Severe Patience treated me or is rather treating me and the results have been great.

Everyone says to me that my smile is very attractive and perfect n I owe them a lot. ***** **** **** ****** * ********

I am Spandan’s mother, We are very satisfied with Mission Smile, their disciplened and professional approach  has really impressed us... the time management is so nicely handled that makes the wait time practically nil. 
Needless to talk about the Doctors expertise and their behaviour... it’s simply brilliant 👍
reply_text:
Dear Mrs. Chakraborty
Your appreciation of our work is the greatest reward for us and this is the only thing which keeps us motivated to improve each day. Thank you for believing in us. Your Smile is ours too!

review:
I went to Dr.Angshuman for my RCT, and I must say that it was a very pleasant experience. The doctor explained me the procedure step by step and the whole process was painless.

The Clinic was also very neat and clean, and the staff were very helpful as well.

I would definitely recommend Mission Smile to all my friends and relatives.

Dr. Angshuman is the most dedicated & committed doctor I have come across in Kolkata. Right from explaining the problem to the remedy, he made me feel most comfortable and infact educated me on many facets related to my overall health. A thorough professional and gentleman. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I got to know this doctor through another dentist. From the very beginning of my visit to him, I got calm down by his professional words, amiable attitude and friendly smile. Although the sum of money is not small, the treatment I got from him and the appliance I received from the US, the instruction and guide  from  the doctor, are all very good. What's more, he is very friendly to my parent which makes me very good. 
The assistants of the clinic are friendly as well. The condition of the clinic is neaty and clean, all of these comtribute  the positive image of the clinic. 
I will introduce others to visit this clinic if necessary.

Very encouraging and always explaining all the queries which are asked with patience.
As you enter the greeting to the patient by the junior doctor who is in charge,makes the patient comfortable.As the doctor checks the patient , hygiene is taken care of and always the patient is asked whether he is feeling uncomfortable or getting hurt when he is doing the treatment.Dr Aniruddho does his work so smartly and precisely that I am so happy that lam undergoing my son's treatment at Mission Smile under Dr Angshuman and Dr Aniruddho.Thank you.

I am really very happy with the excellent treatment that I have received from you Sir. ☺He is too much friendly. We can tell him each and every problem with out any hesitation. His good behavior touched me and finally I am toooo much happy with the whole Mission Smile team. Once again Thank you Sir. ☺

I wore braces for correction of my forwardly placed upper front teeth. It was affecting my smile and self esteem. The lips were looking protruded prior to treatment. However with the latest braces treatment i am now a changed individual with a complete makeover. I would like to thank  Dr. Angshuman and his Team in Mission Smile for giving me a new look. Now I can smile with confidence!

I was really happy with the way my son's treatment was taken care off. The most important thing which I felt was the personal touch given by Dr Angshuman. I used to hardly accompany my son as he was just a call away......any queries, any pain or discomfort and the doc was there to solve it.In fact any dental issue in my family and we know where to go. Thankyou doc for everything.
reply_text: Thanx Ma'am for your valuable words of appreciation!!

review: A throughly  professional team of doctors . We have visited many professionals  doctors but I really appreciate  their time management  and clarity about the treatment. Though we have been late on many occasions. But it really tought us to respect time. Please keep it up
reply_text: Thanx Ma'am...your feedback helps us improve further.

review: Same like the corporate hospitals of kolkata. Effort is on scaring the patients into getting an overpriced service which may be helpful but is the easiest to provide and the patient has to take it on his own risk. Lol. But i hope most people get the required result
reply_text: We are not into business. Had we been into business we would have opened chain of clinics by now. Patient's service is our top priority. Sorry to get that feedback from you even without getting the opportunity of serving you. I believe it was just a consultation where braces had been recommended for you. I don't understand how one can judge us to be over priced and 'patient should avail at their own risk' when 4000 plus happy patients already availed our services in the last 12 years. Thanx anyways for your valuable feedback and my learning.

review: I am fully satisfied and I think their treatment process is excellent. And I am thankful to him and his team for making my smile beautiful. In one word I have wonderful experience there and would love to recommend his name to my friends,family members and known ones for orthodontic treatment.
reply_text: Thanx Pallavi for your most valuable feedback. Please remember to come for your check ups now that the treatment is over. Regards Dr. Angshuman Bhattacharya.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor explained all the problems and talked about the solutions. 
He told us why braces are needed and what problems I might face if I don't get them soon.
Dr. Ashgshuman helped my son.Shrauta to get back his bright & beautiful smile...and now its my daughter Shehala s turn ....thank you doctor...we are very much satisfied with your mode of treatment..

Zero waiting time, perfect diagnosis and lasting solution.
Best in class treatment and quick recovery.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Timely treatment of the white patch in my mouth which could have been malignant through surgery followed by regular check ups has ensured my full recovery. Am also grateful for the empathy shown through doctor friendliness. The patient centricity treatment has resulted in treatment satisfaction and truly brought back my smile.

I would have appreciated had I been informed at the first instance itself that you do not cater to paediatric ortho-dentistry then it would have saved both time & money. I was aware of my son's tooth cavity which is why I needed to consult a dentist. But just for getting a reference to another Doctor for the necessary treatment I feel paying Rs.600/- was not worth it. This could have been told to me at the reception itself that you do not treat children.
reply_text: Ofcourse we cater to Pediatric ortho dentsitry. For your information its a normal protocol worldwide to get your child's routine Orthodontic Check up done  before age 7 years on a 6 monthly basis. We do that and lots of other Orthodontic treatment for kids as early as 5 yearsin Mission Smile. We assessed your child's cavity as a chief complaint and also educated  you that it should be done by a pediatric dentist and not by any of the 12 specialist dentist in our main branch who also treat cavities. Moreover a dentist is not trained to handle the pschological management which is required to give a pleasant first time experience to a young child while treating him. Pedodontists are trained to manage the emotional component of the child during treatment.  We gave you an unbiased honest opinion. And this is because cavity preparation of milk teeth is technique sensitive and different from adult teeth which most patients dont realise and they just come looking for a dentist. You had come searching for a Dentist but we checked your child and gave you the right guidance to go to a Pedodontist. Also we definitely checked his bite and did a timely Orthodontic assessment of his teeth which you as a parent should be aware of. There are some children who come to us for this Ortho dentistry at a very late age and we find hidden cross bites with growth deficiencies of their jaw which cannot be corrected then. So good that you got your child screened for crossbites and underbites which could always be unwantedly present in thier teeth. Your money definitely didnt go to waste. For cavities of milk teeth most parents donot even know the fact that it should be treated by a Pedodontist. And we rightly referred you to our Pediatric Wing. Anyways Cavities are never filled for a very young child on the very first day. Thats a protocol to gain his confidence in a new environment. So time is something you have to invest when its your own child!

review: The doctors and other staff are professional and again friendly and approachable.i like the way they go about in a gradual but sure way,explaining each procedure .dr.angshuman Bhattacharya has got well trained staff under him and he's sure to oversee their  work at regular intervals.the child friendly attitude is the best aspect and instills confidence in the child as well as his/ her parent. Treatment with the doc was satisfactory, but after that he forgot to give the prescription. I had to call for it after going home, then in the prescription he’s not mentioned the floss which I need to buy, which he was mentioning at the time of the procedure. Doctor doesnt even look at d patient. Junior docs n other docs are doin everythn while we pay high fees.There's a poster in d receptn about the imp of punctuality,unfrtunately dts for patients only, I guess
reply_text:
Dear Mrs. Anjela Chhatui
As you know Dentistry is a multi speciality field and there are 9 Post graduate Subjects and specialisations. Your Mom Mrs. Binata Naskar is a Stage 4 Cancer Patient and has undergone Radiation therapy. She is extremely fragile and susceptible to infections. So it was my duty and responsibilty to immediately involve a Periodontist and Geriatric dentist who is specialised to handle such cases. Since he was fortunately present that day i thought it would be apt to show her to him immediately as this is his field where he has 15 years of experience. I being the Director of the Centre am in a better position to understand which patient should be seen by which specialist. You took all the suggestions and we answered all your queries and even gave her the required medicines and planned for future treatment. Never did you once complain about any negligence on our part and also were mutually discussing with your mother about the dates for future treatment. Then how come all of a sudden totally out of the blue you make such defamatory remarks that too on social media to a doctor who has been compassionate and was trying to provide you the best speciality service. 
Truly amazed by your dual behaviour.
Best regards
Dr. Angshuman Bhattacharya
Director 
Mission Smile

reply_text: It was a wisdom tooth removal which was done painlessly.  You were saying over telephone that that your mother is in severe pain. We opened the clinic to do the emergency extraction to alleviate your pain. Kindly appreciate the fact that we opened the clinic calling limited staff just to give relief to your mother. If completion of Covid19 safety declaration came across as being rude to you then you should understand that its a social responsibilty of all to speak the truth. We hope that we could give respite to your mother from acute pain by providing the services in this hour of crisis by taking special permits to travel and come in for this. Rs 900 was the consultation and Rs1200 for WISDOM TOOTH REMOVAL with PPE measures and that is a very standard charge in a clinic which maintains strict protocols of sterilisation and safety measures. And all our patients are equally important to us.
